resources.string: This app uses camera only for object tracking and sent the object location to your BLE connected device, the information from your camera is not sent or collected anywhere else
This app does not use the location, but Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) scanning will only work if Location services are enabled on the device
Because location permission has not been granted, Bluetooth LE devices cannot be scanned by this app.
PAIRING requested\n-> Perform pairing steps. Connect again
